# Campagne-lès-Wardrecques

|term                   = 2020–2026

Campagne-lès-Wardrecques (, literally Campagne near Wardrecques) is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region of France.
Geography
Campagne-lès-Wardrecques is a village situated 5 miles (8 km) southeast of Saint-Omer, on the D200 road, near the junction of the N42 and N43 roads. The Neufosse Canal passes by the commune.
Population
Places of interest
* The church of St. Martin, dating from the sixteenth century.
See also
* Audomarois
*Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department
